description:
Kitano Yuusuke is just another normal, perfectly human student, but he`s behaving awfully strangely today. As humans do. Probably some human chemical destabilizing his human brain. Meanwhile, a lord of darkness faces his greatest challenge yet, and Pascal serves up some café au lait, sans the café.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kitano Yuusuke no Shinjitsu / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
The Truth of Kitano Yuusuke / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
北野ゆうすけの真実 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ
